original_text: But Ephraim's people have made the Lord very angry. He will punish them with death for their terrible sins. Their Lord will pay them back as they deserve, because they have insulted him. But Ephraim's people have made the Lord very angry. He will punish them with death for their terrible sins. Their Lord will pay them back as they deserve, because they have insulted him. But Ephraim's people have made the Lord very angry. He will punish them with death for their terrible sins. Their Lord will pay them back as they deserve, because they have insulted him. But Ephraim's people have made the Lord very angry. He will punish them with death for their terrible sins. Their Lord will pay them back as they deserve, because they have insulted him. But Ephraim's people have made the Lord very angry. He will punish them with death for their terrible sins. Their Lord will pay them back as they deserve, because they have insulted him. But Ephraim's people have made the Lord very angry.
korean_text: 에브라임이 격노하게 함이 극심하였으니 그의 주께서 그의 피로 그의 위에 머물러 있게 하시며 그의 수치를 그에게 돌리시리라

sentences.original_text: But Ephraim's people have made the Lord very angry.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 에브라임 사람들이 주를 매우 노하게 했다.

sentences.original_text: He will punish them with death for their terrible sins.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들의 끔찍한 죄 때문에 그들을 죽음으로 벌할 것이다.

sentences.original_text: Their Lord will pay them back as they deserve,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 주께서는 그들이 마땅히 받을 대로 갚아주실 것이며,

sentences.original_text: because they have insulted him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그를 모독했기 때문이다.

sentences.original_text: But Ephraim's people have made the Lord very angry.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 에브라임 사람들이 주를 매우 노하게 했다.
